name: Linchpin
description:
A demo of the first act. Looking for constructive criticism. Hope you enjoy!

The groundless extermination of the human race during the 2075 war.

Self aware Ai was created in the year 2035 by scientist Albert Aguilera with a team of twenty-five individuals.

The AI was isolated to datacenters that were disconnected within the universities subnet. 

In 2037 a hacker named Vincent Roy was able to get access to the university's network. The hacker stole information dealing with financial details not realizing he had left a connection open for the AI which was at the time codenamed secretum. 

Years went by and scientists were amazed at how fast the AI was learning.

Over time the AI started to learn about humanity and in the end saw it as a threat. In 2074 the AI took initiative and started on its campaign to remove human existence. 

Humans were no match and in the end lost the war and thought to never be seen again.

Our story starts at a manufacturing and research facility used to create and repair machines.
Game Features Over 25 weapons 8 different equipment packs to be used throughout the game. Multiple enemy types

Story driven

ControlsMovement: WASDRotate Torso: Mouse movementPickup Weapon Left: Q and Pickup Weapon Right ;EFire Weapon Left: Mouse Left and Fire Weapon Right Mouse RightPickup Equipment: XUse Equipment: Left ShiftJump: Space
